. "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/webpreview.sh" html_header "Run '${TM_FILENAME}'"
if [ ! -x "$TM_FILEPATH" ]; then CD="$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/bin/CocoaDialog"
rv=`"$CD" yesno-msgbox --no-cancel --no-newline \ --text "File not executable" \ --informative-text "To run '${TM_FILENAME}' as a shell script it needs to be executable. Would you like to make it executable?"` if [ "$rv" == "2" ]; then abort; exit; fi chmod a+x "$TM_FILEPATH" fi
